Title: Ralph Breaks the Internet
Writer: Phil Johnston (screenplay by), Pamela Ribon (screenplay by), Rich Moore (story by), Phil Johnston (story by), Jim Reardon (story by), Pamela Ribon (story by), Josie Trinidad (story by), John C. Reilly (additional story material by), Kelly Younger (additional story material by), Jason Hand (additional story material by)
Actors: John C. Reilly, Sarah Silverman, Gal Gadot, Taraji P. Henson
Plot: Six years after the events of "Wreck-It Ralph," Ralph and Vanellope, now friends, discover a wi-fi router in their arcade, leading them into a new adventure.
